Class DbAlerts

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.system.db.DbAbstract
      • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.system.db.DbAlerts

  • public class DbAlerts
extends DbAbstract
    The Class DbAlerts for updating and retrieving information from the table Alerts in the database.

      static void insertAlert(CtAlert aCtAlert)
      Insert an alert into the database.
      static void updateAlert(CtAlert aCtAlert)
      Updates a alert in the database to have the same details as the CtAlert It will update the alert with the same ID as the ID in the CtAlert.
